title: Electronic communication records for current Robert Eaglestaff Middle School principal

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. An electronic copy of all e-mails sent to and from the e-mail box of current Robert Eaglestaff Middle School principal, Zack Stowell from Jan 1, 2023 to the present day (Aug 2023).

3. Any associated records in any medium, relevant to the public, that relate to the Nesbitt avenue homeless encampment. Keywords "Homeless", "Unhoused", "Nesbitt Ave", "Shooting", "Sex offender", "Public drug use", "Police".  The information requested is not intended to include circumstances of a personal nature, including health, family, or other protected personal information such as address, birth-date, or other identifying information and may be redacted if not relevant to the public.

4. Any associated records in any medium, relevant to the public, between Zack Stowell and current Seattle Mayor Bruce Harrell. The information requested is not intended to include circumstances of a personal nature, including health, family, or other protected personal information such as address, birth-date, or other identifying information and may be redacted if not relevant to the public.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Maureen Callahan
